Here I am importing airline data

```{r}
library(haven)
library(tidyverse)
airline <- read_sas("http://www.principlesofeconometrics.com/sas/airline.sas7bdat", 
    NULL)
airline
```
Cleaning up data

```{r}
airline %>%
 filter(Y >= 7.6 & Y <= 23.8) %>%
 filter(W >= 0.76 & W <= 1.5) %>%
 filter(R >= 
    0.275 & R <= 0.52) %>%
 filter(L >= 2.4 & L <= 6.9) %>%
 filter(K >= 1.8 & K <= 
    9.6) %>%
 ggplot() +
 aes(x = Y, y = W, fill = R) +
 geom_point(size = 1L, colour = "#ef562d") +
 scale_fill_gradient() +
 theme_minimal()
```
